content.question: Which of the following best explains why West Germany experienced issues similar to those discussed in the passage during the 1970s?

choices.label: Decolonization created a large number of migrants into West Germany.
Cold War tensions led to large numbers of refugees from the Eastern bloc migrating into West Germany.
Migrants from Turkey and other countries had come to West Germany in large numbers as temporary laborers.
West German emigration to other countries controls was extremely low in the 1970s.

content.answer: Migrants from Turkey and other countries had come to West Germany in large numbers as temporary laborers.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
